description:
Yosano realizes that her scalpel is missing. Worried that she might have left it in one of her patients, she panics.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dr. Yosano`s Whoopsies! Forgetfulness / Miscellany on Shrimp Tails / Me Drawing You Drawing Me
Yosano-ishi no Ukkari! Wasuremono / Ebi no Shippo no et Cetera / Boku o Egaku Kimi o Egaku Boku
与謝野医師のうっかり! 忘れ物 / 海老の尻尾のエトセトラ / 僕を描く君を描く僕
